code:
stateDiagram-v2
  active: Aktive Belegung
  awaiting_contract: Reservation (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
  awaiting_tenant: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
  booking_agent_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  cancelation_pending: Stornierung pendent
  cancelled: Storniert
  cancelled_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  completed: Belegung (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  declined_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  definitive_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  open_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  overdue: Reservation (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  overdue_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  past: Belegung (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  payment_due: Belegung (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  payment_overdue: Belegung (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  provisional_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  unconfirmed_request: Mietanfrage (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  upcoming: Belegung (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
  upcoming_soon: Belegung (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)


  [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> unconfirmed_request
  unconfirmed_request --> open_request: Mieter bestätigt E-Mail Adresse
  open_request --> provisional_request
  open_request --> definitive_request
  open_request --> declined_request: Vermieter lehnt Anfrage ab
  provisional_request --> overdue_request: Mieter reagiert nicht fristgerecht
  provisional_request --> definitive_request: Mieter setzt Anfrage auf "definitiv"
  provisional_request --> declined_request: Vermieter lehnt Anfrage ab
  definitive_request --> awaiting_contract: Vermieter erstellt Vertrag 
  definitive_request --> declined_request: Vermieter lehnt Anfrage ab
  overdue_request --> cancelled_request: Mieter reagiert nicht fristgerecht
  overdue_request --> definitive_request
  cancelled_request --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  awaiting_contract --> overdue: Mieter reagiert nicht fristgerecht
  overdue --> upcoming: Mieter unterschreibt Vertrag und begleicht Akontorechnung
  overdue --> cancelation_pending: Mieter reagiert nicht fristgerecht
  awaiting_contract --> upcoming
  awaiting_contract --> cancelation_pending
  upcoming --> upcoming_soon
  upcoming --> cancelation_pending
  upcoming_soon --> active
  upcoming_soon --> cancelation_pending
  active --> past
  past --> payment_due: Vermieter erstellt Rechnung
  payment_due --> payment_overdue: Mieter zahlt nicht fristgerecht
  payment_due --> completed: Mieter zahlt Rechnung
  payment_overdue --> completed: Mieter zahlt
  completed --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
  cancelation_pending --> cancelled
  cancelled --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
